TopicTitle: Some Key Binds Posted in a Dev Update for Capture Mode are Not Optimal or Dont Work at All.

Articles.Content:
KSP2 Version: 0.1.2.0.22258
Operating System: Windows 10
CPU+GPU+RAM: i9 9900K+3070ti+32GB
Mods Used: None

The Keybinds Below are From the Following Link:
https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/216100-ask-me-a-few-more-things/

zoom in: keypad +                                                      Works
zoom out: keypad -                                                    Works
roll left: keypad 7                                                       Works Only if NumLock is on
roll right: keypad 9                                                    Works Only if NumLock is on    
orbit up: keypad 8                                                      Works Only if NumLock is on
orbit down: keypad 5                                               Works Only if NumLock is on
orbit left: keypad 4                                                    Works Only if NumLock is on
orbit right: keypad 6                                                 Works Only if NumLock is on
pan up: keypad 2 (or up arrow)                          Only up arrow works. Numpad 2 is bound to Music On/Off 
pan down: keypad 0 (or down arrow)            Only down arrow works.
pan left: keypad 1 (or left arrow)                      Only left arrow works. Numpad 1 is bound to Sound On/Off 
pan right: keypad 3 (or right arrow)                Only right arrow works.
mouse toggle: backslash                                        Doesn't Work.
speed up camera movement: keypad *         Works
slow down camera movement: keypad /     Works.

Recommendations:
Make 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 and 9 work in Flight View with NumLock off (and on maybe?) Took me a little while to figure out why they weren't working.
Make speed up/down camera movement limited to stepped increases and decreases when pressing * and /   Currently it feels more out of control when I can hold down the keys to get extreme opposites.

Edited June 1, 2023 by Anth12
